Gastonia.South Gastonia, North Carolina:
South Gastonia is a suburb of Gastonia in Gaston County, North Carolina, United States. The population was 5,433 at the 2000 census, at which time it was erroneously listed as a census-designated place.


== Geography ==
South Gastonia is located at 35°13′03″N 81°12′17″W.
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP has a total area of 6.4 square miles (17 km2), all of it land.
